A little about me

Hi im Anthony, a 4th year student at Newcastle university, with my studies concluding May 2024. I'm on track to graduate with a first class degree with industrial honours.

I spent the 3rd year of my studies working as a full-stack engineer based at a company in Newcastle: MRI. While there, I gained invaluable experiece as an engineer, working within a scrum based development team.
The application I worked on was Income Analytics, a web based application. I was able to apply and improve both my technical and professional skills, gaining a profound understadning of the Angular framework.

I am also currently, in the process of finding a graduate position as a full-stack engineer.
